pr_title: Reduce resources used by a test

timeline.message:
Reduce resources used by a test

Starting thousand threads within a test method does not play well with
GitHub Actions' resource limits.

timeline.bodyText: where did original number come from. Is 100 enough?
timeline.author: losipiuk

replies.bodyText:
that what i infer from how the assertions are structured
https://github.com/prestosql/presto/blob/77886859578094f0b1828725bd60587881497124/presto-hive/src/test/java/io/prestosql/plugin/hive/TestBackgroundHiveSplitLoader.java#L447-L449
replies.author: findepi
